_header: Men may read in romance right
_description: The Battle of Crecy, by Laurence Minot — ten couplets and nineteen 8-line stanzas (abababab)

BlCottGalEIX.First Lines:
Men may rede in romance rightof a grete clerk þat merlin
                    hight…
BlCottGalEIX.Last Lines:
…held his sege bi nightes and daiswith his men bifor Calays
                    toune
BlCottGalEIX.Attributed Title:
How Edward at hogges vnto land wan / and rade thirgh france or euer he blan
                    (rubric couplet heading, by scribe, f. 54va).
